expected_output: Moho surface, Gutenberg surface, crust, mantle, core

expected_output: Oxidation, dissolution, hydrolysis, hydration, biochemical weathering

actual_output: Galloway's genetic types of delta include distributary, and mouth bar.

input: A typical modern barrier-free coastal sedimentary environment can be divided into __________, ____________________ And__________ Wait for several secondary environments.
expected_output: Coastal dunes, backshore, foreshore, nearshore
actual_output: A typical modern barrier-free coastal sedimentary environment can be divided into beach, tidal flat, and tidal channel.

input: The types of subfacies of barrier coastal facies are ____________________ And __________.
expected_output: Lagoon subfacies, tidal flat subfacies, barrier island subfacies
actual_output: The types of subfacies of barrier coastal facies are beach, dune, and tidal flat.

input: There are two most important seismic wave velocity variation boundaries in the interior of the earth, namely___________ And ___________, According to this, the interior of the earth can be divided into ______________________ And___________
expected_output: (Moho, Gutenberg, crust, mantle, core)
actual_output: The two most important seismic wave velocity variation boundaries in the interior of the earth are the ____________ And ___________, According to this, the interior of the earth can be divided into ______________________ And___________

input: According to the energy sources and characteristics that cause geological work, it can be divided into internal energy and external energy, which include ___________, ____________, ___________, _______________________ And____________
expected_output: (Heavy energy, radioactive energy, page 4 of 8, rotational energy, crystal energy and chemical energy, solar radiation energy, solar and lunar gravitational energy)
actual_output: According to the energy sources and characteristics that cause geological work, it can be divided into internal energy and external energy, which include thermal energy, chemical energy, and mechanical energy. And the geological work includes geological exploration, geological mapping, and geological surveying.

input: According to the geological environment and physicochemical factors of metamorphism, metamorphism can be divided into __________, ______________________ And___________
expected_output: (dynamic metamorphism, contact metamorphism, regional metamorphism, migmatization)
actual_output: According to the geological environment and physicochemical factors of metamorphism, metamorphism can be divided into regional metamorphism, contact metamorphism, and metamorphism.

input: Chemical weathering includes several important chemical reactions, which are ___________, ___________, ______________________ And___________
expected_output: (oxidation, dissolution, hydrolysis, hydration, biochemical weathering)
actual_output: Chemical weathering includes several important chemical reactions, which are hydrolysis, oxidation, and carbonation. And these reactions are responsible for the formation of soil, rocks, and minerals.

input: The main factors affecting weathering are___________ And___________
expected_output: (Physical and geographical conditions, lithology)
actual_output: The main factors affecting weathering are temperature, moisture, and oxygen.

input: The loose deposits on the surface are passed by the wind ______________________ And___________ Transport to other places
expected_output: (suspension, jump, push)
actual_output: The loose deposits on the surface are passed by the wind and transport to other places.

input: Aeolian deposits include__________ And___________
expected_output: (eolian sand, eolian loess)
actual_output: Aeolian deposits include sand, silt, and clay.

input: According to the existing form of water in minerals and its role in the crystal structure of minerals, it can be divided into __________, __________, ____________________ And__________
expected_output: (adsorbed water, crystal water, structural water, zeolite water, interlayer water)
actual_output: According to the existing form of water in minerals and its role in the crystal structure of minerals, it can be divided into hydroxyl, water molecule, and hydrogen bond. And water molecule is the most common form of water in minerals.

input: According to the content of silica, magmatic rocks can be divided into __________, ____________________ And__________
expected_output: (Ultrabasic rock SiO2<45%, basic rock SiO245-52%, neutral rock SiO252-65%, acidic rock SiO2>65%)
actual_output: According to the content of silica, magmatic rocks can be divided into basalt, andesite, and dacite.

input: The diagenesis of sediments mainly includes ____________________ And__________
expected_output: (compaction, cementation, recrystallization)
actual_output: The diagenesis of sediments mainly includes cementation, compaction, and dissolution.

input: The color of sedimentary rocks can be divided into ____________________ And__________
expected_output: (Inherited color, primary color, secondary color)
actual_output: The color of sedimentary rocks can be divided into red, green, and brown.

input: The structural types of carbonate rocks mainly include ____________________ And__________
expected_output: (particle structure, biological skeleton structure, grain structure)
actual_output: The structural types of carbonate rocks mainly include limestone and dolomite.

input: The common grains in carbonate rocks include __________, ____________________ And__________ etc.
expected_output: (endoclastic, bioclastic, oolitic, agglomerate)
actual_output: The common grains in carbonate rocks include quartz, feldspar, and mica etc.

input: , their codes are respectively.
expected_output: Triassic, Jurassic, Cretaceous, T, J, K
actual_output: Their codes are respectively.

input: From morning to night in the Mesozoic era
expected_output: Regional metamorphism, dynamic metamorphism, contact metamorphism
actual_output: From morning to night in the Mesozoic era

input: Metamorphism includes ____________________ And___________ Three categories.
expected_output: Standard, standard, cycle, cycle, environment, environment
actual_output: Metamorphism includes ____________________ And___________ Three categories.

input: When dividing the strata of a region, it is generally to establish a___________ Section. All sections with complete stratigraphic exposure, normal sequence, clear contact relationship and well preserved fossils can be used as___________ Section. If it is marine strata, it often shows repeated changes of lithofacies from coarse to fine and from fine to coarse. Such a change is called a deposit ___________, That is, each set of transgressive horizon and regressive horizon constitutes a complete sedimentary ___________. Strata can also be divided according to lithology. The lithologic change reflects the sedimentation to a certain extent___________ Changes, while deposition___________ The change of the earth's crust is often closely related to the crustal movement. Therefore, the strata are divided into many units according to lithology, which can basically represent the development stage of local geological history________ and
expected_output: Physical weathering, chemical weathering, biological weathering

Answer the sentence by filling in the blank space. Answer should be just the missing words that fits in each blank If there are no blank spaces, fill in the end. without any additional information.

input: Weathering includes ____________________ And___________ Three categories.
expected_output: Volcanic agglomerate, volcanic breccia, tuff
actual_output: Weathering includes physical, chemical, and biological processes.

input: Pyroclastic rocks can be divided into_________ Three categories.
expected_output: Fault, seismic wave, magnitude
actual_output: Pyroclastic rocks can be divided into three categories.

input: The Mesozoic era has existed from morning to night, and their codes are respectively.
expected_output: Triassic, Jurassic, Cretaceous T, J, K
actual_output: The Mesozoic era has existed from morning to night, and their codes are respectively.

input: According to the mechanical properties of plate activity, the contact types of plate boundary can be divided into _________________ And_________ Three.
expected_output: Tension type, convergence type, shear type
actual_output: According to the mechanical properties of plate activity, the contact types of plate boundary can be divided into subduction and transform.

input: In 1968, Lepihon divided the global lithosphere into __________, ___________, __________, _____________________ And___________ Six sectors________ and
expected_output: Eurasian plate, Indian Ocean plate, Antarctica plate, Africa plate, Pacific plate, America plate
actual_output: In 1968, Lepihon divided the global lithosphere into tectonic, geographic, geologic, geomorphic, and geochronologic. And six sectors.

input: Weathering includes ____________________ And___________ Three categories.
expected_output: Physical weathering, chemical weathering, biological weathering
actual_output: Weathering includes physical, chemical, and biological processes.

input: Pyroclastic rocks can be divided into_________ Three categories.
expected_output: Volcanic agglomerate, volcanic breccia, tuff
actual_output: Pyroclastic rocks can be divided into three categories.

input: Most earthquakes are generated by brittle rocks in the earth's crust, and seismic energy is transmitted in a certain way. It is commonly used to measure the intensity of energy released by an earthquake.
expected_output: Fault, seismic wave, magnitude
actual_output: Most earthquakes are generated by brittle rocks in the earth's crust, and seismic energy is transmitted in a certain way. It is commonly used to measure the intensity of energy released by an earthquake.
